description: This file defines an API client class for handling HTTP requests to a backend service, with methods for GET, POST, and DELETE operations, utilizing environment variables for configuration.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A simple HTTP client wrapper for interacting with backend services, supporting environment-based URL configuration and standard HTTP methods.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Constructor for ApiClient instances, initializes the base URL.

methods.name: ApiClient.fromEnv
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates an ApiClient instance using the environment variable 'API_BASE_URL', with a fallback to localhost.

methods.name: getList
methods.description: Performs a GET request to retrieve a list of items from the specified path.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Performs a GET request to retrieve a single item as a Map from the specified path.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request with a JSON body to the specified path and returns the response as a Map.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request to the specified path.
